member.name: T:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Kartris.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Kartris.Worldpay.AcceptsPaypal
member.summary: 'Whether this payment gateway accepts PayPal as a payment option.

member.name: P:Kartris.Worldpay.AuthorizedOnly
member.summary: Whether this payment gateway can only be accessed by authorized users.

member.name: P:Kartris.Worldpay.GatewayName
member.summary: Gateway name that appears in the payment gateway dropdown in Kartris checkout

member.name: P:Kartris.Worldpay.GatewayType
member.summary: Whether this is a REMOTE or a LOCAL payment gateway.

member.name: P:Kartris.Worldpay.RequiresBasketItems
member.summary: Whether this payment gateway requires Kartris to pass the basket items

member.name: M:Kartris.Worldpay.ProcessOrder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Remote Payment Gateways only -Process order data and to generate the form fields to submit.

member.name: M:Kartris.Worldpay.ValidateCardOrder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used by local payment gateways only. Directly accepts and validates credit card info. Return "false" if doing remote gateway.

member.name: M:Kartris.Worldpay.RefreshSettingsCache
member.summary: Instructs the gateway to refresh the settings cache response.
